instructions.textEng: Play the game to work out how much insulin is needed for different amounts of carbohydrate using the ratios shown
instructions.textCym: Chwaraewch y gÃªm i gyfrifo faint o inswlin sydd ei angen ar gyfer gwahanol symiau o garbohydrad gan ddefnyddio'r cymarebau sy'n cael eu dangos.
instructions.failedRoundEng: Oh no! You hit too many ketones. Tap 'okay' to try this round again.
instructions.failedRoundCym: Oh no! You hit too many ketones. Tap 'okay' to try this round again.

rounds.roundTxtEng: Collect enough insulin for 100g of carbohydrate.
rounds.roundTxtCym: Casglwch ddigon o inswlin ar gyfer 100g o garbohydrad
rounds.endRoundTxtEng: Well done completed the round, you've colleced 5 insulins
rounds.endRoundTxtCym: Da iawn. Rydych chi  wedi cwblhau'r rownd, rydych chi wedi casglu 5 inswlin
